reviews.name: Michael J.
reviews.content: RISE.SK is a reliable developer. I assigned tasks directly from the Kanban board and the team completed them efficiently. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a responsible partner.

reviews.name: Matej Š.
reviews.content: Thanks for quickly arranging the consultation. RISE.SK helped me develop a website analysis tool - the project finally moved forward. 5/5!

reviews.name: Tomáš V.
reviews.content: SQL database training with RISE.SK was engaging and practical. They clearly explained advanced techniques, answered all questions and solved complex problems step by step. Now I feel much more confident working with SQL.

reviews.name: Timotej L.
reviews.content: I started Python completely from scratch. RISE.SK quickly explained the problem in a friendly atmosphere, the code suddenly worked and progress was immediate. I recommend to anyone who wants to master Python quickly and effectively.

reviews.name: Pavel K.
reviews.content: RISE.SK helped me a lot with the C project. Professional approach, clear explanation, perfect result. I recommend 5/5 ★.

reviews.name: René
reviews.content: I needed help with Python at work. RISE.SK set up a clear plan and the lessons were both understandable and practical. I can only recommend the cooperation.

reviews.name: Jana G.
reviews.content: RISE.SK guided my son to programming in English. The lessons were always prepared, focused on his goals, and progress was visible at every lesson. I also appreciate the team's professional English.

reviews.name: Zuzana P.
reviews.content: I have programming tutoring with RISE.SK. Communication is problem-free, they adapt time-wise, explain everything and make sure I try the solutions myself. Great support for developing practical skills.

reviews.name: Roman S.
reviews.content: I'm in my first year of university and RISE.SK tutors me in programming. They explain everything great, they are reliable and they really know what they do.

reviews.name: Daniel K.
reviews.content: Professionalism at every step - RISE.SK was able to clearly explain every concept and answer all questions. Great tutoring, I recommend.

cta.title: Ready for Your Own Success Story?
cta.description: Let's create something amazing together. Contact us and let's discuss your needs.

services.title: Complete Digital

webDev.title: Custom Web & Mobile Development
webDev.description: Bespoke websites, SaaS platforms, PWAs, iOS/Android apps with modern stacks (React, Vue, Node, Laravel, Flutter)
benefits: Brand edge: Tailor-made builds boost UX, speed, and search visibility
Scalability: Codebases grow with you—no licence lock-in
Ownership: You keep the IP and future-proof your digital assets
webDev.team: Cross-functional pod — PM devs ready in under 7 days

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud Reliability
devops.description: CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration (Docker, K8s), cloud migration (AWS, Azure, GCP), 24/7 monitoring
devops.team: 1 DevOps engineer + SRE on demand—integrated with your existing squad

design.title: UX/UI & Front-End Guild
design.description: User research, wireframes, interactive prototypes, design systems in Figma + Storybook
benefits: Intuitive design raises conversion and retention
88% of users won't return after bad experience
design.team: Lead designer + UX researcher + Front-end dev(s). Perfect for brands that need polish as much as code

qa.title: Quality Assurance & Test Automation
qa.description: Unit, integration, and end-to-end tests (Jest, Cypress, Playwright), performance and security testing
qa.team: 1 Automation QA + 1 Manual tester for each project sprint

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.subtitle: Ready to work with us? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you quickly.
contact.description: Ready to transform your digital presence? Our technology experts team is standing by to discuss your project and provide a custom solution that drives real results.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, timeline, and goals...

templateMessages.webDevelopment:
Hello,

I am interested in creating a modern website for my company. I would like to discuss the possibilities and get more information about your services.

Thank you.
templateMessages.mobileApps:
Hello,

I am considering mobile app development. I would like to learn more about your approach to iOS and Android app development.

Thank you.
templateMessages.customSoftware:
Hello,

I need a custom software solution for my company. I would like to discuss our needs and implementation possibilities.

Thank you.
templateMessages.ecommerce:
Hello,

I am planning to launch an online store and I am interested in your e-commerce solutions. I would like to get more information.

Thank you.
templateMessages.aiAnalytics:
Hello,

I am interested in implementing AI and data analytics solutions in our company. I would like to discuss the possibilities.

Thank you.
templateMessages.digitalMarketing:
Hello,

I am looking for technological solutions for digital marketing. I would like to learn more about your services in this area.

Thank you.
templateMessages.specialRequests:
Hello,

I have specific requirements for a technological solution that I would like to discuss. I believe you can find a suitable solution.

Thank you.
templateMessages.other:
Hello,

I would like to discuss collaboration opportunities. Could we connect and go over the details of my project?

Thank you.
